Description: Create a cluster with pods living in a vnet subnet. The cluster takes its identity from a managed identity resource.
Create a VM within a virtual gateway enabled vnet. You may then go ahead and configure a S2S VPN from anywhere!
Create 2 peered vnets. You will also find an Ubuntu in each vnet respectively. Goodie to have for back-to-back testing.
Spin up a win2019 DC and an Ubuntu 18.04 simultaneously in their own subnets within a vnet. Instantly empowers you with dual OS capability! Cost control optimized.
Create a AGW with a VM as its backend in a vnet
Create a Service Fabric cluster with Windows container
Create a Service Fabric cluster with Linux container
Create behind an application gateway two public app servicesthat connect to the same managed PgSQL
